blocks.label: Rich Text
blocks.content:
• Create pages and connect to Nuxpresso for Strapi CMS articles


  • Design and create reusable layouts, components, forms and elements to add to your content with full control of your content appearance without coding


  • Animate with stunning included animations or create your own


  • Be fast with copy&paste, duplicate elements, hotkeys shortcuts, instant preview, screenshots, component treeview with drag&drop


  • Reuse any component created
